review_title: GAME DOES NOT WORK WITH QUEST 2
one_reviews_text:
Game worked the first time I played it (bought on steam and played through steamVR/oculus link via direct connection with usb-c cable), my pc shutdown while I was halfway done with the first level. It has been unable to load this level again, even after loading the main menu perfectly fine and am able to put the disc in and enter the loading screen fine.
All other games I have played have worked without problem and this is the only one.
Tried buying it on the oculus store too but again the same problem.
DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU HAVE THE QUEST 2

review_title: Why isn't this on the Quest?
one_reviews_text: This was my favorite game on my Oculus Rift, and the reason it took me so long to sell it when I bought a Quest. I've been hoping they make a version for the Quest ever since I got it.

If you like the series you will love the game. Rick being a jerk and morty being morty. Funniest games I've played and its in VR.  Truely get the feel of living in ricks house with the cast of the show. The game does take a lot of computing power to play smoothly, I had to upgrade my video card to get it into a playable game. Don't go by the minimum VR requirements.  Longer game than I expected for the price. Definitly worth the price. Very happy with this purchase. Just wish they would come out with another like it.

review_title: Graaaass... is bad. This game isn't.
one_reviews_text: Wubbadabbadickydickytaffy... in birdperson language it means "this is a good VR game"
I love this game
its kinda short, and i wish i can refund

This game, like many,  say "Best with room scale".  It isn't BEST with room scale.  If you don't have enough room, you wont be able to even get started.  You cannot actually move.  Where it puts you is where it is centered.  You cannot navigate with the controllers.  You cannot pick up things from a distance.  You must walk to a wall, select a disk and put it in a dvd player and press start.  If you are not able to do that you won't be able to start the game.  I could just barely make it.  Then, I was put inside of a washing machine, and rick and morty berated me for about 5 minutes because I couldn't easily open the washing machine and wash some clothes while in the washing machine.  Love Rick and Morty.  Would have loved the game with joystick movement.  Maybe you get it later on.  I don't know.  It was too frustrating to continue.

review_title: Crashes evertime I enter the garage.
one_reviews_text: Crashes without fail as soon as morty starts talking when you enter the garage, this is garbage.

review_title: This is no waste of money
one_reviews_text: 6/5. This is a great game. It has a short but fun story mode, and free-play is filled with easter eggs and mini-games. It is hilarious and great i definitely recommend it!

i dont really think its worth your time to buy this game if your on quest and using the link, as for when i bought the game i could not get in. If you play on rift you may have an easier time getting in. So please if you are using the link with your quest dont waste you time and valuable money on a game you cant play.
If you love the show, then this game is a must, its a short game, beat in about 3-4 hours, but there are tons of easter eggs and fun things to do, and you get to hang out with the guys!
i was playing rick-ality but on the third level the package was to small for meeseks to reach as my hand was on the floor i still couldnt reach

review_title: very fun and cool game i love rick and m
one_reviews_text: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Quest version?

I bought this game because I saw an ad for it somewhere. I had figured that there was a whole lot more to the game than there actually was. The campaign was very fun and the graphics are great, but after the 30 minute - 1 hour long campaign, there is almost nothing to do except try different endings in the minigames. The game is very fun but not worth $30.

Maybe there were big shoes to fill but while going through what I thought would be the intro of the game ... sudden ending. For $30, or whatever, you get to teleport around 3 locations in the garage, interact with a couple objects, and that's kind of it. I feel ripped off after playing the game.

review_title: Major glitch issue but good game so far
one_reviews_text:
I was enjoying it and I absolutely loved it until I 
got to the third computer fixing mission. I entered the micro thing or whatever where you charge the battery and one of the levers was literally immovable for me. If someone has advice for this do tell because now I feel like I just missed out on a fun game and wasted $30
I loved this so much. I hope they make a second one. And a much longer one too.

new to oculus and this is the first game i have bought. got hald way into it and game just crashes. i have uninstalled and reinstalled, made sure that there is enough memory available when running. i also reported the issue to the adult swim where it told me to report it, and they told me they dont mess with the game just the site in which you buy the game. i have played for more then 2 hours and dont qualify for a refund. so if anyone has had the same issue and was able to fix it please HELP!
just watch someone else play it
cant make any pickle characters not even the easy ones it just gives me the energy bars

review_title: Overpriced but ok puzzle game for fans
one_reviews_text: This is way too short and basic to be $30, but if you catch it on a big sale and are a fan of the show and/or pretty simple VR puzzle games you might enjoy it.  The voice acting and graphics are pretty good.  I got bored quickly though, wasn't particulary fun/funny.

review_title: This game is cool but no quest
one_reviews_text: I love this game allot its fun to just mess around but i wish i could use the quest
Great for fans but I beat most of the content in a couple of hours, fun but short.
i love this game  but one problem is hard to pick things  from the ground and to tall to small in the wall hey that rymes but still it worths 30 $ it is worth it but its beter with mods

review_title: I summoned my inner Pickle Rick
one_reviews_text: Game was very cool, and had me laughing my butt off at points, but if you have a small play space like me, I wouldn't reccomend the game because you need a lot of space to do some of the side stuff.
Crashed at the begin from lvl 1

2 stars because it doesn't completely suck. I guess it could just about steal 3 stars if you set the bar really low and you'r a fan of the series. Thinking back at it i'm trying to remember a funny moment when i might have laughed... nope. Barely an uneasy half laught at best. 4 stars if you are on drugs, 5 stars if you'r on muchrooms maybe.
Good and fun game but a lot of problems picking stuff off the ground because the game floor is lower than my actual floor. I can’t go any lower to pick stuff up
even though im a fan of the series i dont relly see much fun when i played and i never laghed like i do when i watch the show. it could be a 3 star but idk i just got boared really quick

review_title: Such a fun game with such fun secrets
one_reviews_text: This is a game you must play once, even if you are not a fan of Rick and Morty, it is still an extremely fun and hilarious experience to play. The Graphics are great. It runs very well, and original voice actors for beloved characters we have come to love. I love this game and is still on my top 5 games on the Oculus Store. I hope in the future, they will make another game as good as this one!

This game is awesome but please work on a new system of movement the teleportation system is a bit boring and over used but other developers .. if giving people options to switch to joystick movement with the touch.. you guys would get a lot more supporters. By allowing that people would feel a deeper experience giving them a freedom to move and make the experience much more enjoyable.
Was able to beat it in 1hour 45mins
I love this game! Do you guys plan to release it on Quest?
I’m a fan big time

review_title: Very fun - perfect for any fan
one_reviews_text:
Good replayability, tons of easter eggs and funny items.
Anyone who has seen the show will totally nerd out on this one, must have for any real fan.

NO motion sickness: My wife played this for hours (standing) and she never lasts even 5 minutes in VR, so its very very comfortable and immersive.

** There are ways to break the game in the middle of it, so be careful of how you throw stuff or break/clone/drop stuff. Don't disappoint Rick ya Morty!
I’m sad because when I purchased it I hadn’t seen that it only supported rift and not quest, so yeah I had to refund it.

review_title: Good game just a bit short
one_reviews_text: This is a great game if you are a fan of the series. I really enjoyed it, the gaphics are stunning and the controls are smooth. It is a bit short but still worth it.
i was expecting for something more out of the game but the story is to short and the game is overpriced

review_title: Love the game, but cant start it anymore
one_reviews_text: This is probably the most favorite game of my kids. But in the last 2 weeks (maybe after a new release?) I cant start it anymore.  Error Code (OVR25027186) and also the message that the package failed to launch app (1971014). Deinstalling and reinstalling did not make the trick. Did not find any hits on google that this might be a migger issue. So maybe only on my PC... sad. Waiting for a new release, maybe it fixes itself.
It’s lit

review_title: Fun for a Fan: Befuddling Otherwise
one_reviews_text: I wish I could scrub my brain temporarily of Rick and Morty just to see what this game is like for anyone who has never seen the show.  Fun?  Confusing?  I don't know, but my gut tells me only get this game if two conditions are met: one, you have seen the show and love it (as I have and do) and two, you have plenty of room to walk around.  PLENTY.  There are wall-colored paint marks on my right Touch controller  because of this game.  Do I wish they had freeform movement to make it a bit easier to play with limited space?  Absolutely.  But if you have the room, the money, and are a raving mad fanatic (as I am and rave) then this is a must buy for Oculus.  Think of it as an overly long episode of the show starring you!  (At least until Rick shoots you in the face.)

Won't lie, the game is very fun. Shorter than an Alien Googah though. Not worth the money for less than two hours of play - hopefully they launch a free expansion, and then I'll be sure to update my rating.
I finished this game in 15 minutes and it was fun but there is no replay value wait for a sale!
I did a play through in roughly 1 hour and 30 minutes. I don't think this game is worth 30 bucks.
Fun But very short

review_title: an episode of rick and morty in VR
one_reviews_text: Really fun ! It's short, but it's really well made

I bought this game a while back and forgot that I had it, because it was really short, granted there is stuff you can do after you beat the game but for about 10-30 bucks, it's not worth the begging price.
This game is SOOOOOOOOO beautiful but is tooo much short

Playing it through for the first time was fun, and wouldn't work without the voice acting.  For the pricetag however, it is just way too lacking.  It seems more like an extended proof of concept than a game.  'The Stick of Truth' made you the main character of an entire South Park season.  This game makes you the main character for 1 episode.  Bare bones done well.  I enjoyed the puzzles; they could make a very good game if they put in the effort.  Admittedly, they say it's a cash grab in the game's promotional video, and it definitely is.
I love the show, and the game was fun for all of 2 hours until I beat it. I feel like for the price tag, the amount of content was lacking.

review_title: amazing but could have been better
one_reviews_text: Good game but the story was to short in  my opinion and it did'nt really feel like something Rick and Morty would do. and mabey update for seasone 3 features becuase once you finish the game theres not much to do. and I feel like we should been morty note just a clone morty it wouldve felt allot more like the show if it was like that. but overall an amazing game and a blast to run throught the story mode and be a boss high;y recomed to anyone who has watched Rick and Morty.
Wubba lubba dub dub biches. I'm Pickle Rick. I'm stuck in the garage and don't know what to do. I bet you did read this in Rick's voice.. But seriusly I'm I'm I'm burp Pickle Rick.
I got it for 50% off and feel ripped off.
If you are a fan of the show this is a MUST, if you are not I would wait for a sale as it's short but still really fun VR game.
It is a very interesting puzzle game, but it is too short, expensive for the time of game. But still interesting to live with the characters of Rick and Morty
very good game! feels like an actual episode of rick and morty! one small thing.. it should be longer, add more stuff!
Loved the game! Only reason for not giving 5 stars is it is too short. Needs more levels. But really enjoyed the experiance that was there. Hopefully some more content comes out.

First off - everything that everyone says is true. It is to short, there is only a few environments, etc. etc. etc.

But if you are a fan of the show and have already spent on a gaming computer and an Oculus the price of entry should not scare you away, this is a Rick and Morty episode that needs to be played through. There are the obligatory easter eggs and the gameplay is pretty standard fair as far as VR goes. But there are tons of new gags and jokes that had me laughing as hard as I do when watching the show.

If you are a serious fan of the series there is no reason not to buy this - even better if you can get it on sale.

Being a fan of the TV series I enjoyed the game. It was short but I bought it on sale and was very happy with my purchase. There were many occassions when I had to pick things up off the floor which was problematic and frustrating due to tracking limitations. Nothing too challenging but good fun and nice to see and hear the characters.

review_title: Only for hardcore Rick and Morty fans
one_reviews_text: Not much to say about this game. It's well made and funny, but if you watched any of the reviews on YouTube... then probably you know most of the jokes already. Also it's re-playability is next to none. Generally a bit too expensive in my opinion (even in the daily deals).
Would only recommend if you really like the show, not much value in it otherwise.  Some decent bits, but other parts feel a bit lacking.  No real replayability, could use a bit more content or depth.
The app is lacking season 3 content and could really use an update (more levels). Otherwise this game is great

review_title: A Must-Have for Fans of Rick and Morty
one_reviews_text: The game is fantastic fun.  It's an open world VR, with a ton of stuff to play with, and omg, there is, in fact, a VR version of the game Roy from the television show, in this case, called Troy.
Funny, especially if you like the show, but too short for the price, and lacks more diversity in the environments.

review_title: Well made, fun and funny, but short
one_reviews_text:
This is a well-made game in that controls/interactions are intuitive and reliable, gameplay is smooth, and everything flows well.  It has a reasonably strong if rambling narrative.  Of course if you're a fan of the show it's really cool being immersed in  an episode.

The only downside for me was the value.  It took me under 2 hours to get through, and once it was done I felt like it was... done.  There are some secrets and small digressions that I've read about, but it doesn't seem worth it to replay the scenarios just for those.  If you can get it on sale, then I say absolutely go for it.  Short duration and lack of replayablility are the two things that lose it a star, but it is an excellent game otherwise.

Loved the game, love Rick and Morty.. Puzzle games are my thing and this was fun... Much shorter than I expected. I hope there will be a lot bigger and longer game coming some day. Pricey but still worth playing.

review_title: Brilliant, but only for fans of R&M
one_reviews_text: A lot of cool ideas and implementations, graphics could be more cartoonish, and gameplay is way  too short for  20USD

review_title: 4 only for that im a fan!
one_reviews_text: I put 4 as a Rick n Morty fan! i loved the game and i even really felt myself as a dumb Morty clone)) puzzles are pretty easy , but the whole atmosphere of crazy Rick n Morty world took me over and i couldnt stop until the game was finished! Pretty short, but good)

In short: It's boring, not worth the time playing, there is absolutely no replay value in it, and there is no challenge in it. It requires truely the largest space any game required so far for me, so don't bother getting it with a small space, you won't be able to play it not just well, but at all - for me I had to move to the edges of my place even though no other game with large area required so much. It's comparable to that first Oculus VR experience you get when you launch Oculus first time, with the floating robot head and the panels. Feels like an extended version of it with lesser graphics. The beginning was a little bit fun, but that's where the fun also ended. It's mostly a take-things-from-here-and-put-there game. Thankfully I got it only as part of a big pack, as it's not worth paying the price.

review_title: Be a character in a comedy cartoon show
one_reviews_text: People that say they finished it in 2 to 3 hours, well it took me double to triple time that. That's because the game is about puzzles, but with a strong comedy narrative. You can go and try completing quickly but miss most of the comedy, or take it slow and get to hear most of the comedy narrative in the game - it has so much narrative in it than any other game I've played. Comedy cartoon show, comedy narrative driven game along with solving some puzzles. Comedy was great. Replayability? It has some replayability after completion of game, but it doesn't excite me enough to go try it out. One play through, and a very long one at that, was enough! Need to play other games now! Also I would wait to get it on sale due to the lack of interest on my part of wanting to replay it. But as a comedy cartoon experience of one play through, give it a shot! I mean, I did complete it fully myself, so it wasn't a case of I didn't enjoy it, I did, but not enough to replay it!
I love Rick and Morty show, but paying that money for the equivalent of 3-4 shows its absurd.

Great experience for anybody familiar with the show. It's story-driven and feels like a long episode of Rick n Morty. Only bad things I can say is that there's not really any replay value and the price is a bit too steep.

EDIT: was there an update or something? It doesn't run smooth anymore, low fps makes it unplayable.
if you like the show you will like this. only reason it isnt 5 star for me is cause its kind of short
A classic Rick and Morty adventure.What else do you need to know to buy this (the game itself has probably like 3 hours of gameplay but was still worth it to me).

Everything is pretty boring with a few chuckles now and then. Only fun part of the game is the charging the batteries part, but it is ruined when even if you fail to power one up, you don't need to worry to start all over because it will let you continue from where your battery power was. Lame
Quirky VR Experience that suckles at the popular teet of Rick & Morty, it's funny; but not really a game. VR Integration works well, isn't so great for a small space. The puzzles were barely puzzles.

review_title: Job Simulator With More Advanced Puzzles
one_reviews_text: If you liked Job Simulator, and want another version with puzzles that get a little more tricky, this is for you.  I had a blast with it, and I'm not even a Rick and Morty fan.  It's short, so you may want to get it on sale or in a bundle.

The game world was well designed and controls are amazing but I can't help but feel they could have done so much more with the game. It can be completed in a few hours with some hidden in game content but not enough to justify price. It pains me to say but stay clear.

This is fun. It's actually more fun if you have bought it, go and watch an episode of Rick And Morty (Because I'd never heard of it) and then come back. The series is one of the funniest things I've seen in years.

Don't feed the squirrels, Morty.

One of my favorite experiences on the rift, probably biased because I love the show so much. However it was fairly short with not much to do after the game is finished. If they were to put out any additional content that would really make the game worth the 30$ price tage in my opinion.

review_title: Way too short, not enough content
one_reviews_text: This is a fun game, definitely feels true to the rick and morty show, but you just have the garage, which consists of three different stations to play around in, and then a couple small areas accessible through portals. Sure its charming and fun going through the story, but it's so short, feels about as long as one job in job simulator. For $10, this would be a must buy, for $30 I'd say look for something else.

I'm a huge Rick and Morty fan, but this was a colossal waste of time and money.  Rick and Morty work best as characters when there's something for them to do, but they're not really doing anything here, just trying to riff on the current fetch quest you've been given, or even making jokes about the total lack of content.  There's a couple of solid jokes here but there is no depth to the game at all, just pick up this, put it there, repeat.  Avoid.
Every rick and morty fan needs to try this game.

This game is every bit as fun as others describe. The single player is short, but the free play gives you hours of sandbox immersion in the Rick and Morty universe. Tons of easter eggs. Hopefully there will be updates in the future!
Short ? Yes ! Original ? Hands down. Pricey ? yes ! Worth every penny ? YES !!!!

review_title: If you're a fan of "Rick & Morty" on CN
one_reviews_text: If you're a Fan of Rick and Morty on Cartoon Networks Adult swim, you MUST buy this game!  It has everything a true fan wants, inside jokes, time travel, and of course Mr. Poopy Pants! Need I say more?  Its one of my favorites, and I have invested a lot of money in bad VR titles.

review_title: Got with Summer Bundle...wasted my money
one_reviews_text: I thought because of several high reviews that this might be fun to play and got it with the summer bundle of Arizona Sunshine/Job Simulator. I don't know, nor care who Rick and Morty are but from what I've played I don't know if I will put the time into it to bother finishing.
Yep, this is awesome!
Very fun experience for a couple of hours. I wouldn't pay full price for this game though, as $30 is far too high for what this game is.
game is waaay too short to justify the 40$ price tag, no matter how funny and great it is
Graphics is sufficient, but the humor is great and the VR integration is also smooth.
Have to use Oculus Main Menu to rotate view.  Complete garbage.
Rick and Morty are the saving grace of this game.  If it weren't for the theme it would be less than one star.  It's a lot of mone for a really average job simulator sequel.
amazing game no doubt but is to much for how small and short the game is

This is a Rick and Morty Job Simulator! you're a morty clone doing chores in the garage for rick. It's funny and a whole ton of fun, only complaint is that sometimes it's unclear whatyou are supposed to do. I would only reccomend this to Rick and Morty fans.
It's way too short to entertain me for a long time. The price is a bit high for 2 hours worth  of gameplay.
Im trying to download it but its stuck on 70 71 72 73 percent all the time can someone help
its sorta short and i expected to go on adventures or something but instead i had to do chores so yeah im not saying this game is bad but i think the price should be 20$

In this case the fun factor was greater than the downside which is that it is short.  Going into it with that expectation, you will not be disappointed.  That is literally the only negative I have to say.  It has a little bit for everyone, interaction, adventure, exploration, puzzles to solve, and guns to shoot.  They did a really good job with this game, I just wish there was more of it!  

I loved when I teleported to space, I sincerely felt a little insecure for a moment, it was that real even for a cartoon.  It is very interactive and I would recommend this as a good value for anyone, even if you have no clue who Rick and Morty are.
While this game is crazy fun and very funny there re not a lot of missions.  if you like the show it's a must have!  10 times better with a third sensor.
This is a fun little game with some refrences, but it is way to short. Maximum 10$ value IMO.
Amazing if your a rick and morty fan but you will be clueless if not. Best vr game ever in my opinion!

Amazing , The things you can do is incredible, and its fun all the way through..I am playing in a small space, and i accidently reached up forgetting i had a fan on in my room, i broke my index finger...totally worth it tho. rickdickulous i know. PLEASE BRING MORE! take my moneyyyy
This game is amazing. The only problem I could have with it is that it ends too quickly. If it had more "episodes", it would easily be my favorite vr games.
Not enough content for the price, finished in 2 hours.
was expecting more
I really hope we get some new "discs" or expansions. i'd gladly pay for a bit more content. One of the VR must haves and showpieces when I show off my Rift!

If you are a fan of Rick and Morty and love VR games with a ton of stuff to do then THIS IS FOR YOU. 

I've had hours of enjoyment both during the storymode and in the free play mode. I keep finding new stuff every time I jump in and I love the achievements. 

It really feels like a lot of work went into the game so I can understand the 30 bucks price. Plus I want the developers to know that I support them and have really enjoyed this game. 

The best part to me was the ingame VR as TROY. I love the reference to the show and all the different paths you can take is awesome. 

Great game keep up the good work!
Fondeled a Plumbus in Ricks Garage. Automatic 5 Ricks.

review_title: For any Rick and Morty fan
one_reviews_text: The game is really short, maybe like 1-2 to complete. But once you finish the game, there are alot of easter eggs and collectables you can find that only true Rick and Morty fan will understand.

Just getting out of the garage is painful enough with that mimic bot.  Once you get past that it's still cludgy to move around.  Rick and Morty is awesome and they make for great entertainment.  Unfortunately this title does not live up to what I would expect from that franchise as this is clearly capitalization of a great TV show at its finest.

If there was a way to get a refund I'd request it.

I know everyone is gonna get mad at this but this is just how it is. its a good game enjoyable but unless its ur first vr experience you will not be blown away by anything except the price 30$ for what is basicly an hour or two of fun.it is SUPER interesting to combine items and handle everything in ricks garage but its not ANY different then job simulator only even shorter and with a rick and morty skin. and if ur excited to use a teleporter DON"T BE it really is the worst part of the game they hype it up but there is like 3 locations 2 of them are smaller then a closet in an apartment and one of them is fun to be in once. don't get me wrong its a GREAT game for 15 dollars the real problem is that is 30 dollars and not really that different from job simulator.and hey if u have played job simulator you can just watch a rick and morty lets play so u can get the jokes see the stuff and save urself 30 dollars on a game you will use once for twice and never look at again

review_title: Best vr game that I have played to date
one_reviews_text: this is game that any rick and morty fan will enjoy, it is a little short, but has lots of replay value
Super fun Rick and Morty experience. If you like the show you will like this game.
Very fantastic his garage is FULL of trash cause i really have no idea what to combined item or grow bigger or what the hell i am doing so yea fantastic game please make more game like this.

review_title: Love it but wish there was more
one_reviews_text: Loved it, any Rick & Morty fan should, just a little on the short side but some fun bits and after unlocking a 'level' can jump back in at that point and once complete there are some easter eggs to find, so some replayability
It's not the best VR game out there, but it's still Rick and Morty. If you're a die-hard R&M fan, might as well pick it up. If you aren't, just pass on this one.

ok so against my better judgement i bought this game mainly to show on my youtube page. i found it annoying as hell to play. if u have front facing setup this game is a waste of your money u can't turn to do some of the things u need to do which WILL cause you to rage out and the $30 cost is a joke. and while this might not bother most people the fact this is a teleport only game sucks the most for me. save ur money and skip this game

review_title: Its like being apart of an episode!
one_reviews_text: It may be short but man is it ever funny! The puzzles were cool and weard and the humor from the show is all there! Finished the Story in about 70 mins. If your a huge fan like me then totally buy this! If not then wait for the price to drop. Price per length is a very subjective opinion and if you like the show as much as i do then I think you will be satisfyed. You can also replay all the puzzles anytime you want there are 13 tapes to find and a shooting gallery! Wubalub a dub dub!
I love the humor, please keep more coming!

review_title: does what the told it is going to do
one_reviews_text: if you know rick and morty, buy it. if not, you dont need it

High polish and fun content. If you're a fan of the show you must try this. The humor is classic Rick and Morty. The little mini-game, Troy, is really fun and adds a little to the replayability. A little bit short compared to the price, but I'll take quality over quantity any day!
Please make this longer, I am a die hard R&M fan so I would love to see some DLC added on or just a further continuation of this game.

Im a big fan of rick and morty but I was underwhelmed. I hoped for more of an adventure with the characters but you stay in the garage doing puzzles most of the time.
Few bugs but other wise an okay experience
Roomscale VR setup required as there is very poor and limited virtual movement controls. Quite frustrating.

Extremely fun, with lots of hidden goodies for fans of the show. It would have been nice to be able to leave the garage, and I would have liked the option to play as Rick, but the humour and story made up for any shortcomings, in my opinion. Best 30$ ever spent, and I would definately be interested in a potential sequel, if they ever decided to make one

If you enjoyed job simulator your going to love this. And if you also love Rick and Morty youll 2x love this game. The only thing thats holding me back from a 5 star game is thr fact thats its like and 1 to 2 hour vr game. So if your hoping for a long vr game look somewhere else or atleast wait for a price drop.

Finished the game easily... only one 'thinking' part where you had to repair the space ship with fuses... I hope they expand this game for the $30 outlay... kindof expensive for a limited experience game. Enjoyable, but short and I don't watch 'junk food for your mind' television... so I don't really know who these cussing cartoons are but it was still a playable game. People who like to be put down should really get into it, but it is just a game. I really trashed the place with junk the first time I played it... which was awesome.

review_title: A brillent game !cant wait for season 3!
one_reviews_text: If you are a Rick and Morty fan then this game is a must..Nice graphics with a good sense of humor and cleaver puzzles !! Please note that this game require a reasonable space for roomscale to get most of the game.. Highly recomended game for the fans out there !!

I can finally play with a Plumbus
#9moreseasons
frustrating vr controlls. very shot game, ripp-off.

review_title: Love Rick & Morty but not worth $30
one_reviews_text: All of these other comments sum up the game pretty well. It's a fun 2-hour experience where you spend the majority of your time in Rick's garage. Lots of cool references to the show, but only gives you a small taste of what you should be getting for a $30 price tag. Roiland's voice acting was the best part... that and Troy.

It's a nice game, pretty comfortable. You need to have a larger area to play in than just 1 square meter. I got a bit stuck when I had to stand on the satelite because I'm scared of heights but managed to complete the level with a mixture of taking the headset off and just blindly reaching through portals.
Not much of a game for the price ($30US) but I guess they have to cream it because there aren't many people in VR yet. The game seems more like a demo than a game, it's mostly set in the garage. If you have a lot of space to move around you could walk around the living room but there isn't much to interact with there.
To expencive tech demo!!! And not even fun!!!

review_title: Essential for Rick and Morty fans
one_reviews_text:
I spent a little over an hour with the game tonight. I'm a huge fan of Rick and Morty and I found myself laughing to myself many times during the session. If you're a fan of the show, I think that you'll find it entertaining.

This game isn't perfect though. There's a lot of recycled material from job simulator. It actually feels like it should be titled "Job Simulator: Rick and Morty edition". 

If you're a fan of Job Simulator and/or Rick and Morty, I think that this game is worth shot!

If you're a Rick and Morty fan and you own a Rift, BUY THIS GAME! The game is disappointingly short - don't expect more than two or three solid hours of gameplay. However, being able to interact with the R&M universe is so much fun. Highly recommended!

If you are a fan of Rick and Morty, buying this game is a no brainer. The puzzles are challenging, the voice acting and visuals are perfect, and game mechanics like movement and interaction are well done.

review_title: The game is not the campaign/story
one_reviews_text: This is a Rick and Morty sandbox that has a short story at the start, there is a lot to do and find in this.
The things the developers have to do are ridiculous (trying to watch DVD & washing machine BS).  IMO: The developers wanted to make $$$ on popular series & gouge customers.

review_title: Way too short for the price
one_reviews_text: anyway good game

review_title: THE GAME IS GOOD BUT TOO SHORT
one_reviews_text: The gae is fun to play I finsed the main stuff in 1:30 HR. I like it for what it has. t is too short besides the bonus stuff. I hope The Dev. have new updates to the game.

review_title: Didn't know Rick and Morty but...
one_reviews_text: I bought the game anyhow because I enjoyed Job Simulatior very much! And this one is even better, using the same or even better game mechanics! It's a must buy, very good done, very immersive and bloody fun, even if you don't know Rick and Morty as most Europeans do.
Truly a delight. Better than expected it to be - it's just like Job Simulator but better jokes and an environment that you care to be in. Plenty of fun, too bad it doesn't last 100 years.
Needs more content though...
Amazing game exactly like an episode of Rick and Morty but felt for the price the story mode should have been a bit longer
I liked the content in the game for what it was, but this is at best $15 worth of content. For $30, I'd expect something to last twice as long and have more replayability.

at least it was not 50 $ 15 would be  a better price point  im used to  50$ games giving me 40-200 hours of play time.the touch implimentaion was ok but lacked basic hand gestures availible  for the touch.
Fun.  Short.
But the fact that I cannot do any horizontal movements or repositioning makes this unplayable with a large amount of space. A simple possiblity to reset position would fix this

This is one of the greatest games in VR I've ever played. However, there is only one problem. IT'S WAY TOO SHORT!
Finished it in about 2 hours! 
Hope there will be some update with more episodes (= disks).

I'm gonna need you to take your opinions and shove'em waaaay up inside your butthole. 

This is an awesome game! Sure there isn't a handholding objective system, but who cares! This is Rick & Morty!

I'd pay to have Rick take a virtual dump on me!
I'd never heard of Rik and Morty before but thought I'd give it try... Loved it but it was awy too short.
A VR Rick and Morty.  I couldnt be happier than if you got Kate Beckinsale to clean my house naked.  Perfecto!
but its rick and morty with half of real game hidden. use your brain
Don't even hesitate, don't even worry, don't even give it a second thought. What are you  even worried about? Get in here quick, get out quicker, with an arm full of virtual rick-ality in your arms.
hope to see future DLC... highly unlikely though
there is no was to trun horizontaly, but the game is great fun
You've been reviewed.
Had a great time but it was way to short for the price

review_title: This is my one armed man
one_reviews_text: I dont care if it takes 9 more seasons! Cannon stuff happens in this game, or does it? time will only tell

Even if you dont know the show, the game will make you watch the TV show.  My wish is the same as others.  Make more "levels" with interactions with them.  
FUN FUN FUN
This game is seriously awesome.
Its raining money wuba luba dub dub
Not that funny, not that interesting gameplay-wise. Clearly a bunch of work went into this, but it's really just... meh.

In a nutshell this game is job simulator, but with actual puzzles and a purpose for doing the actions... Oh and it's funny as balls!
100 MORE YEARS!!!
finaly biening in that garage
awesome and funny

review_title: Great gameplay, would love to see more
one_reviews_text: Loved it, the gameplay is really engaging and the narrative keeps your entertained. Would love to see more eventually.

It's an interesting play, but also seems like an earlier VR game where you just play with toys, rather than an adventure you'd expect for 30 dollars.  It's very short at less than 2 hours, and it flies by.

There are other great games for 30 dollars such as Obduction.
wVeeI just wish ut was longer.
